source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Radiant Guise of the Heavens

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

Transmogrified to:
Forged Aspirant's Plate Wargreaves

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to imbue you with Sanctified Swiftness, granting 74 Speed stacking up to 10 times.

After receiving 10 stacks, release the stored energy dealing 785,102 Holy damage split between all enemies within 10 yards.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Unleash your inner tempest to gain 11,849 Strength for 15 sec. Your next 3 abilities cause a lightning blast dealing 666,467 Nature damage to your primary target. Damage increased by 100% with each subsequent blast. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,811, up to 14,056.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 3 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
